title: Bought 2 Emotes, Not In Inventory
body: Bought 2 emotes from the shop and none have appeared in my inventory.

replies.body: Hey FearlessMoon, I looked into this for you but I don't see any recently purchase emotes over the week but I do see two transactions for -350 RP.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help you out with this and see what happened.  We'll see you there!
